title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8008.9 - Committee on Public Access to Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8008.9 - Committee on Public Access to Records

State Regulations
(a) The division shall transmit copies of all
requests for appeals, on receipt of the request, to the Committee on Public

Access to Records, Department of State, 41 State Street, Albany, NY
12231. (b) The division shall
transmit decisions of appeals to the Committee on Public Access to Records
within seven workdays of the receipt of a request for an appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8008.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
